languages.text: {n}Массивный техножрец указывает на Паскаля и издает гулкий рев, словно фабричная сирена. Вибрация проходит по вашим костям. Украшенные знаком шестерни сервочерепа-глашатаи, следующие за ним, визгливо трубят:{/n} "Не терпи херетека в кузнице своей, ибо ржа рождает ржу. Паскаль Ханейманн, ты арестован именем Адептус Механикус".

{n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."
languages.original_text: {n}Массивный техножрец указывает на Паскаля и издает гулкий рев, словно фабричная сирена. Вибрация проходит по вашим костям. Украшенные знаком шестерни сервочерепа-глашатаи, следующие за ним, визгливо трубят:{/n} "Не терпи херетека в кузнице своей, ибо ржа рождает ржу. Паскаль Ханейманн, ты арестован именем Адептус Механикус".

languages.text: {n}巨大な技術司祭が手をパスカルに向け、大きな騒音を立てる。その音は工場のアラームによく似ていた。騒音により骨が振動する。歯車の紋章が刻まれたヘラルド・サーヴォスカルが後を追う。けたたましい音が鳴り響いく。{/n}「汝、その鍛冶場において錆びつく異端技術に苦しむことなかれ。パスカル・ヘニュマン、帝国技術局の名において、あなたを逮捕する」
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な技術司祭が手をパスカルに向け、大きな騒音を立てる。その音は工場のアラームによく似ていた。騒音により骨が振動する。歯車の紋章が刻まれたヘラルド・サーヴォスカルが後を追う。けたたましい音が鳴り響いく。{/n}「汝、その鍛冶場において錆びつく異端技術に苦しむことなかれ。パスカル・ヘニュマン、帝国技術局の名において、あなたを逮捕する」
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}身材壮硕的技术神甫用手指着帕斯卡，高声怒吼起来。他的声音就像工厂的警报一样，你浑身上下的骨头都在震颤。他身后跟着先驱伺服头骨，头骨上画着齿轮的印记。所有头骨都以尖锐的声音怒吼起来。{/n}“你不该在异教的熔炉中受难，因为铁锈只会带来更多铁锈。帕斯卡·哈努曼，我以机械修会的名义在此逮捕你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."

traits.locale_text: {n}身材壮硕的技术祭司用手指着帕斯卡，高声怒吼起来。他的声音就像工厂的警报一样，你浑身上下的骨头都在震颤。他身后跟着先驱伺服头骨，头骨上画着齿轮的印记。所有头骨都以尖锐的声音怒吼起来。{/n}“你不该在异教的熔炉中受难，因为铁锈只会带来更多铁锈。帕斯卡·哈努曼，我以机械修会的名义在此逮捕你。”
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Der gewaltige Techpriester deutet mit der Hand auf Pasqal und brüllt markerschütternd, einem Fabrikalarm nicht unähnlich. Deine Knochen vibrieren. Herold-Servoschädel mit einem Zahnrad-Emblem tun es ihm nach. Sie rufen schrill:{/n} "Ihr sollt nicht dulden einen Häretekten in Eurer Schmiede, denn Rost bringt Rost hervor. Pasqal Haneumann, im Namen des Adeptus Mechanicus, Ihr seid verhaftet."
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der gewaltige Techpriester deutet mit der Hand auf Pasqal und brüllt markerschütternd, einem Fabrikalarm nicht unähnlich. Deine Knochen vibrieren. Herold-Servoschädel mit einem Zahnrad-Emblem tun es ihm nach. Sie rufen schrill:{/n} "Ihr sollt nicht dulden einen Häretekten in Eurer Schmiede, denn Rost bringt Rost hervor. Pasqal Haneumann, im Namen des Adeptus Mechanicus, Ihr seid verhaftet."
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}L'énorme technoprêtre pointe Pasqal du doigt et pousse un rugissement tonitruant qui n'est pas sans évoquer l'alarme d'un complexe industriel et dont les vibrations se répercutent jusque dans vos os. Des servocrânes émissaires marqués du symbole du rouage évoluent dans son sillage en beuglant d'une voix stridente :{/n} « Ne tolérez pas d'hérétek dans votre forge, car la rouille engendre la rouille. Pasqal Haneumann, au nom de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, vous êtes en état d'arrestation. »
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'énorme technoprêtre pointe Pasqal du doigt et pousse un rugissement tonitruant qui n'est pas sans évoquer l'alarme d'un complexe industriel et dont les vibrations se répercutent jusque dans vos os. Des servocrânes émissaires marqués du symbole du rouage évoluent dans son sillage en beuglant d'une voix stridente :{/n} « Ne tolérez pas d'hérétek dans votre forge, car la rouille engendre la rouille. Pasqal Haneumann, au nom de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, vous êtes en état d'arrestation. »
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}El inmenso tecnosacerdote señala con la mano a Pasqal y suelta un bramido estruendoso que suena como la alarma de una fábrica y hace que te vibren todos los huesos del cuerpo. Varios servocráneos heraldos, marcados con el emblema del engranaje, flotan tras él mientras vociferan una consigna:{/n} «No permitirás la presencia de un heretek en tu forja, pues la herrumbre engendra herrumbre. Pasqal Haneumann, en nombre del Adeptus Mechanicus, queda usted bajo arresto».
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."

traits.locale_text: {n}El inmenso tecnosacerdote señala con la mano a Pasqal y suelta un bramido estruendoso que suena como la alarma de una fábrica y hace que te vibren todos los huesos del cuerpo. Varios servocráneos heraldos flotan tras él, marcados con el emblema del engranaje, y vociferando una consigna:{/n} «No permitirás la presencia de un heretek en tu forja, pues la herrumbre engendra herrumbre. Pasqal Haneumann, en nombre del Adeptus Mechanicus, queda usted bajo arresto».
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Heybetli Tekno Rahip, eliyle Pasqal'ı işaret ederek bir fabrika alarmını andıran büyük bir uğultu çıkarıyor ve iliklerine kadar titremene neden oluyor. Dişli amblemiyle işaretlenmiş haberci hizmeletler, bu işareti takip edip cırtlak bir tantana koparıyor.{/n} "Dökümhanenizde bir tekâfir bulunmasına daha fazla katlanmayacaksınız. Pas, pasa neden olur. Pasqal Haneumann, Adeptus Mechanicus adına tutuklusun."
languages.original_text: {n}The enormous Tech-Priest points his hand at Pasqal and lets out a booming roar not unlike a factory alarm. It makes your very bones vibrate. Herald servo-skulls marked with the emblem of the cog follow in his wake. They blare shrilly,{/n} "Thou shalt not suffer a heretek in thy forge, for rust begets rust. Pasqal Haneumann, in the name of the Adeptus Mechanicus, you are under arrest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heybetli Tekno Rahip eliyle Pasqal'ı işaret ederek, bir fabrika alarmını andıran büyük bir uğultu çıkarıyor, iliklerine kadar titremene neden oluyor. Dişli amblemiyle işaretlenmiş haberci hizmeletler bu işareti takip ediyor, cırtlak bir tantana koparıyorlar:{/n} "Dökümhanenizde bir tekâfir bulunmasına daha fazla katlanmayacaksınız. Pas, pasa neden olur. Pasqal Haneumann, Adeptus Mechanicus adına tutuklusun."
traits.speaker: Tarzus
